channel.title: CVE Feed for PrestaShop -- dashproducts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PrestaShop -- dashproducts

item.title: CVE-2020-15102|2024-08-04T13:08:21.786Z -- prestashop -- dashproducts
item.description: In PrestaShop Dashboard Productions before version 2.1.0, there is improper authorization which enables an attacker to change the configuration. The problem is fixed in 2.1.0.
